messages.message: Most of the projects included software development and web applications in Java, Node.js, Vuejs, Postgres, Oracle, and Docker. I worked on Infocert, Campari were the back end part was migrated to Spring Boot, Hibernate. Additionally, Stampa was built, allowing the creation of a hybrid iOS/Android app with Augmented Reality features. Finally, Keywords Studio which is a translator management system and i still work.

I worked in both front-end and back-end applications, configuration of Linux webserver, bash scripting, and integration with Apache and Nginx. I have worked on projects such as Ing Direct, Monte Paschi di Siena, Cariparma (Internal Doe Framework), and Vodafone (Volte management app). My last project involved creating a communication channel between new and old technologies for a P2P.
Thesis about designing and implementing a web application for psicologies

messages.company: Graduation @Technical and Technological High School “ITIS A.Panella”
messages.message: Graduated from Technical and Technological High School “ITIS A.Panella” with a paper about electronics technician
